item.title: workqueue
item.description: An example of composition in Kubernetes workqueue is a package that lives in the kubernetes/kubernetes repo (for now) under the path k8s.io/staging/client-go/utils/. The workqueue package exposes data structures that controllers use to manage operations on resources. The lowest layer of the abstraction is the basic queue with an interface that looks like this (renamed to Queue for clarity): type Queue interface { Add(item interface{}) Get() (item interface{}, shutdown bool) .
